segments.text: Hi , could you help me ? I need to make a dinner reservation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can help you if you can just tell me what evening you like the reservation for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tuesday night is when we need the reservation for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time do you think that you would like to have dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many diners will be in your group ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We need a reservation for four .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a table for four available at 7
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My last name is Foster . Thank you for the reservation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . Foster , we will be expecting you this Tuesday at 7
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will be there ! Thanks for the help !
segments.speaker: S2
